channel.title: Unexpected disconnection!? HELP!
channel.description:
There is no error, but instead, it sometimes disconnects all the player on the server, making it look like this...
[code]Game saved for player1 Client Handler: Disconnected player1 Game saved for player2 Client Handler: Disconnected player2 Game saved for player3 Client Handler: Disconnected player3 Game saved for player4 Client Handler: Disconnected player4 Game saved for player5 Client Handler: Disconnected player5 Game saved for player6 Client Handler: Disconnected player6 Game saved for player7 Client Handler: Disconnected player7 [/code]
And some people wouldnt be able to go back on. [br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 12:31:11 PM[/size][hr]Also, when I restart my server, people can't get on immediatly. They have to wait like 5 minutes till they can go on, otherwise they will see "error connecting to server"

item.title: Unexpected disconnection!? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

get a new server… thats all i can tell u

Read full topic

item.title: Unexpected disconnection!? HELP!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

There is no error, but instead, it sometimes disconnects all the player on the server, making it look like this…

Game saved for player1 Client Handler: Disconnected player1 Game saved for player2 Client Handler: Disconnected player2 Game saved for player3 Client Handler: Disconnected player3 Game saved for player4 Client Handler: Disconnected player4 Game saved for player5 Client Handler: Disconnected player5 Game saved for player6 Client Handler: Disconnected player6 Game saved for player7 Client Handler: Disconnected player7

And some people wouldnt be able to go back on.
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 12:31:11 PM[/size][hr]Also, when I restart my server, people can’t get on immediatly. They have to wait like 5 minutes till they can go on, otherwise they will see “error connecting to server”

Read full topic
